title: Power Circuit Diagonal Swap
description: Render the numeric glyph 3 on the power-status matrix. All ⬛ grids must be transformed into the glyph using the same token.
hints: Draw the digit 3 using the same non-⬛ token across all sizes.
Top, middle and bottom rows become solid; rightmost column is solid; left half curves are formed with gaps.
Input grids are entirely ⬛; output must overlay the glyph exactly within bounds.
